page.title: 03Mr.Watson-farming-publicity
page.content: Farmers are better informed now due to farming magazines,local radio (Cumbria is especially good) visiting speakers and television.As a member of the Milk Marketing Board Mr.Watson spends a lot of time away from his farm giving lectures and attending meetings.He goes to S.E.England two days every month to Board meetings. He thinks that farmers often get bad publicity,much of it unjustified,and in fact most farmers try to improve the quality of their products and to conserve wild life. Mr.Watson enjoys farming but he also likes meeting people and working outside his farm for the general good of agriculture. His eldest son recently left school and will,after careful farming experience and further education follow in "father's footsteps."
